title: Backyard Camping
description: In Backyard Camping, two sisters prepare for a fun evening of sleeping in their backyard. Students will want to have their own backyard campout after reading this fun book suited to emergent readers. Additionally, the text lends itself to lessons on classifying information and using pronouns.
meta: backyard, camp, flashlights, pajamas, sleeping bags, tent
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Short Vowel Sounds : Discriminate short vowel /a/ sound
Pronouns : Identify and use pronouns we and our
High-Frequency Words : Recognize and use the high-frequency word we

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
